JennAir Noir Appliance Repair – Certified Service for Bold Luxury Appliances

White-Glove Repairs for JennAir Noir Ovens, Cooktops, Refrigeration, and More

JennAir’s Noir Collection is an ode to rebellion and refinement—where matte black finishes meet professional-grade performance. With its sleek design, smart functionality, and bold aesthetics, the JennAir Noir line redefines what a luxury kitchen looks and feels like. When one of these high-end appliances needs service, it deserves nothing less than factory-level precision and a service experience that mirrors its luxury.

At ZARICCI Luxury Appliance Repair, we offer certified JennAir Noir appliance repair with factory-trained expertise, genuine OEM parts, and white-glove in-home service. Trusted by high-end homeowners, designers, and property managers throughout Southern California, we restore JennAir Noir appliances with the same attention to detail they were designed with.

🔧 Why Choose ZARICCI for JennAir Noir Repair?

  • ✅ JennAir-Certified Technicians
    Our technicians are factory-trained to service JennAir’s Noir Collection, including wall ovens, smart cooktops, built-in refrigerators, column freezers, and specialty appliances.
  • ✅ Genuine OEM Parts
    We install only original JennAir components to ensure lasting performance, preserve warranty coverage, and maintain the integrity of your appliance’s minimalist design.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Service
    We offer priority booking for luxury residences—providing quick, discreet service at your convenience, with minimal disruption to your space.
  • ✅ White-Glove In-Home Experience
    From the moment we arrive, we protect your flooring, cabinetry, and appliances—working quietly, respectfully, and leaving no trace behind.

🛠️ What We Repair in the JennAir Noir Collection

🔥 JennAir Noir Wall Ovens & Speed Ovens

  • Touchscreen not responding
  • Uneven cooking or convection issues
  • Broiler not working or delayed preheating
  • Error codes and smart system failures

🔥 JennAir Noir Cooktops (Gas, Induction, and Electric)

  • Gas burner won’t ignite
  • Induction zone not heating
  • Control knobs not functioning or temperature fluctuations
  • Cracked glass surface repair

❄️ JennAir Noir Refrigeration Systems

  • Inconsistent temperature or cooling loss
  • Ice maker or water dispenser not working
  • Smart diagnostics, compressor, or sensor issues
  • Column fridge or freezer panel alignment

🚿 JennAir Dishwashers

  • Poor cleaning or drying performance
  • Water leaks, drainage issues
  • Touchpad errors or cycle problems

📱 Smart Appliance Integration Issues

  • Wi-Fi pairing issues with JennAir app
  • System crashes, firmware problems
  • Smart diagnostics and software resets

Whether you own a full Noir suite or a single signature appliance, ZARICCI ensures it performs as beautifully as it looks.

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI White-Glove Repair Process

  1. Effortless Booking
    Schedule by phone or online. Our concierge team matches your appointment with your calendar and your property’s access needs.
  2. On-Time, Certified Diagnosis
    A JennAir-certified technician arrives on time, in uniform, fully prepared to identify and explain the issue.
  3. Detailed, Transparent Estimate
    We provide a written quote before any work begins—so you know exactly what to expect.
  4. Precision Repair with OEM Parts
    We complete all work using original JennAir parts, to manufacturer specifications.
  5. Final Testing & Immaculate Clean-Up
    Your appliance is tested rigorously, and your home is left spotless—no tools, no mess, no compromise.

  • Los Angeles County – Beverly Hills, Bel Air, Pacific Palisades, Brentwood, West Hollywood
  • Orange County – Newport Coast, Laguna Niguel, Irvine
  • Ventura County – Calabasas, Thousand Oaks, Westlake Village

Whether your Noir kitchen overlooks the hills, the coast, or the skyline, ZARICCI delivers discreet service worthy of the design.
